name: CONCEPT_CAPTION
description: Stores the captions of the items that filed the concept.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the value record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CURRENT_CAPTION
columns.description: Stores the caption(s) of the item(s) as they were when the data was filed
